                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 reviews
## 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Too small
## 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         This chair is comfortable and helps keep good posture. Such good quality!
## 3                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Chair is comfortable. It’s easily tilts which makes me nervous sometimes b/c I almost feel like I’ll tilt too far back & fall BUT that has NOT happened. Chair got 3 stars b/c it does not roll smoothly although it does have wheels. I have tile floors no carpet & I still feel like the chair does not roll like it should. It was cost efficient & matches perfect with my small desk so it’s still a WIN for me. I do not need to roll anyway 😂
## 4                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           I got this chair to replace my old one. So far its worked pretty well. I did have one issue with assembly because I put the base of the chair on backwards (the part with the lever), so the chair would tilt forward instead of backwards, so make sure to put it on like in the picture on this product page. It was also a little difficult to screw stuff on because the holes werent very well alligned, but once I got it together, it was sturdy. Spins well, and tilts well (once I put the base on correctly).
## 5                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            I love this chair. It is the perfect size for my height. I am 5’0 so the chair fits me perfectly, and it is not bulky at all. If you’re looking for a chair that doesn’t take up all that space then this would be perfect. My husband is 5’8 normal built, and it was too small for him, so I would not recommend this chair for a tall heavy person because it would be too snug. It would also recommend it for a child’s/teenagers study desk too.
## 6                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Ordered this chair for my daughter. Put together easily and works wonderful. I ordered one chair for myself, while putting it together one of the screws on the seat would not go all the way in. I returned it ordered a second one and and two screws on the bottom of the seat would not go all the way in and would fall out. I return this one too. I will be ordering a different brand.
## 7                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         I bought this chair for my wife.Pros: Simple assembly with tool included (hex key). Assembly time was 30 minutes with one cup of coffee.  Looks nice. Now here is the primary kudo, 1x fastener each and plastic cap were included as spares, something I am beginning to see more often - nice.Cons: Instructions could have been more verbose, I myself didn't need it, but I could see some people would. The plastic plugs that cover the four screws on the back of the chair continuously fall out. Simple solution, a small dab of hot glue, just small dab, so you can take them back out if ever needed.  I imagine that Elmers Glue (a small dab) would do the same trick.Overall, the price of $39.99 made it a sweet deal if it lasts for several years. The price is why I bumped it up to 5 stars. My office chair is mountain gorilla-butt strength and runs over $250.00.
## 8                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                This is a professional looking, comfortable chair. I use it with a variable height desk, so I like that the wheels move smoothly as I push it back or forward. Good lumbar support is a plus.

## 15                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Love how sturdy this chair is. Works perfectly and fit into my new setup budget quite well
## 16                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     It’s a very good chair. Comfortable, sturdy enough, easy to assemble. It would be much better a higher back rest., but very nice in general.
## 17                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               When I first got the box I saw that there were some black stains and the seat but they were so tiny you couldn’t tell unless you look really close so I didn’t want to go through the work of returning and waiting for another. No big deal. But then there were some scratches on the wheels and base so it looked like it was used. Again, no big deal cause it wasn’t super obvious and I don’t have time to carry a huge heavy box return to the post office so I just kept putting it together. It was overall cute and I thought I got a pretty good deal for the price until I actually sat in it. The wheels don’t even move!! 🤦🏻‍♀️ I thought maybe it was one of those chairs that only move when you’re not on it so it stays in place while you’re sitting in it so I tried off of it too. Checked to make sure there were no locks or anything stopping the wheels but they wheels just did not move. At most there were two wheels that moved a little bit but couldn’t make the whole chair move since the other wheels wouldn’t budge. If the wheels moved I would’ve kept since i like the color combo and it was a good deal but if it doesn’t feel super comfy AND doesn’t move it’s just a waste of money at this point. Maybe I got a bad pair of wheels? Not sure, but pretty disappointed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 This chair is so well built compared to my last one.  The base, including the supports for the casters is all metal.  There is no chance that a plastic bracket is going to let go and render the chair useless.  The seat is nice and wide and fairly comfortable but not cushy soft.  I actually find it comfortable to lean back against the lumbar support as well.  Well worth the money.  We will likely be purchasing a second one for downstairs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              I bought this chair a few weeks ago for the start of online school, being a bigger fellow, I wanted something a little wider with more padding. I was pleasantly surprised by the size of the chair. Took me a little bit to put together myself, but, it wasn't too bad. My only "gripe" is that I wish my cushion was a little more padded and comfortable. It's more firm than... cushion-ey, if that makes sense. For that, I cannot give it 5 stars.
## 54                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             This is a nice chair.  I am not "big and tall" but wanted a wider chair so that my small dogs could sit alongside me in an office chair while I work on managing our empire.  I decided to purchase the good but used version to save a couple of dollars cause I'm cheap as heck, lol.  Chair came in a somewhat damaged box.  It was fairly easy to put together but the instructions are only picture so I wasn't 100% sure about some things, like how to put the wheels on.  The instructions didn't say anything other than showing the male wheel part going in to the female chair part so I wasn't sure they would click inside and hold in place but they did.  It's comfortable to sit in.  Downside is that the lumbar piece that slides up and down doesn't slide all the way down cause it's meant for someone taller, haha.My biggest issue with the item is that all of the screws were not in the package.  I am missing one of the screws where the back attaches on to the underneath of the chair seat and all of the arm piece screws are missing.  So I cannot attach the arms to the chair.  While I can use the chair without the arms in place, it sorta defeats the purpose of buying this chair cause I can't put the pillow in place for the dogs to lay on.  My own fault for saving a few dollars and buying a good but used chair.  Had no idea it wouldn't have all the parts to go with it.  Hoping to buy the screws locally so I can attach the arms and the last screw on the bottom.  Otherwise I'm happy with the item itself.

## 57                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Honestly bought this as a hold over until I can afford a high end ergonomic chair...  With that said I'm really in no rush to replace this.  I'm 6'4, almost 300lb, the chair feels great.  The assembly was slightly annoying (I just wish the base was preassembled and welded instead of the machine screws- still very sturdy!).  The mesh back is change for me and feels great in long gaming or work sessions, the seat cushion is very respectable for the moneyPros:+Feels sturdy from the moment I sat on it+Solid metal/steel support components+Price to value (to me)+The "3d armrests" adjust vertically easy but don't rotate like my old chair... Which I prefer!!!!  The can be adjusted narrow or weirder with an allen wrench/key (came with a solid one and a nice handle to make building easier)+Decent instructions+Decent lumbar adjustmentCons:-Assembley can be cumbersome, might need an extra pair of hands to hold things in place to assemble, although if you're patient take your time you can do it alone.-each spoke on the base is attached with two fairly heavy duty machine screws, does feel good, but personally just wish this was preassembled and welded.-if you're significantly taller than me, say 6'6 and above the back my might be a bit low.  For me I prefer this for acoustic reasons (I'm an audiophile and don't want my head in reflection zone like most gamer chairs do). But if you want a head/neck rest maybe reconsider.
## 58                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      If you are a human, your primary purpose is to be excellent at human relationships.If you are a chair, your primary purpose is to be excellent at supporting a human's butt - while keeping said butt and attached organic material free from pain.This chair is the best chair in almost every way: It is taller than other chairs, bigger than other chairs, stronger than other chairs, it's armrest is superior to other armrests.This chair is terrible at only one use case: Sitting.Immediately when I, a large human, sat on this chair. My butt and specifically my tail bone said, "Pressure overload, spinal injury will likely occur in 30 minutes!"I used my hand sensors to inspect the chair material and discovered it was quite lumpy. It appeared to have springs inside the chair creating an uneven distribution of pressure.I looked at my old chair and noticed that it had a low spot in the same area where this new chair was creating the most pressure.I can only conclude that the engineers who made this chair either have never sat in a chair or have no large humans nearby to test said chair and communicate that the chair is not useful for sitting purposes.Now I, as a busy human, decided to try said chair for a few days. As the days progressed, my body posture contorted to multiple sitting positions to avoid the pressure without much success. My tail bone did indeed begin to express pain.My brain concluded: "Sitting in such a chair for many hours a day would certainly lead to long term damage."Not wanting to spend additional money on another chair. I jotted a note in my brain storage for future reference: In the future, perhaps buying a chair, butt-untested, is not a great idea. Next time I will have to visit a physical-presence-selling-place-that-allows-butt-testing.Then I began my journey towards chair refactoring:After taking off the chair-back with the four support bolts - using the hex tool which came with the chair. I needed to acquire my trusted utility tool.This tool is my long-time companion which I always carry on my belt when I am wearing pants. Of course being in my home-environment without pants, I had to first travel to my clothing-storage-area to obtain my utility tool from the last-worn-pants.After removing some of the staples on the back edge of the chair, I had enough room to begin inspecting the interior of the chair's butt-support structure. I quickly found the offense:Someone had decided to place the box-springs from a small doll's bed inside the middle of my chair.I disagreed with that decision.After removing a few more staples from the cover material, I removed the box-springs entirely from the chair.At first, I thought I would modify them, but after seeing the result shape of the chair now resembled my old chair. I decided it was time for a butt-test.I was pleasantly surprised. The pressure distribution was now even and almost perfect - matching ideal butt-support specifications.tl;dr: - 5 stars after chair surgery (1 star before)

## 62                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Bought this for my home office. It's easy to assemble. The wheels work well on my carpet. It's sturdy enough, overall. It's big! It's probably larger than what I needed, or realized when I bought it. But it works! I have lower back disc issues and a bruised tail bone. I use a special butt-pillow while sitting on this (and any) chair. So far I haven't had any pain arise while using this chair. The back rest is mesh and very firm. I guess that's good considering the weight it's supposed to support. The lumbar piece is really firm, too, which I dislike, but then again, my back hasn't had any problems with it as it does with other office chairs, so maybe this firmness is what my back needs. The seat cushion of the chair is cushy and I could see it being uncomfortable and flattened after prolonged use, so I'd recommend buying an additional cushion if you're like me and have back/butt issues. The arms are adjustable up/down. Since the seat is extra wide, the arms aren't squishing into my sides. The back doesn't recline independently from the chair (a feature my in-office chair has) but rather the whole seat tilts back slightly (not very far). Overall, good chair.
## 63                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           The good, I'm a tall big dude, 6'5" 280lbs so its hard to find chairs that are comfortable and at least right now this is comfortable. It also seems to be made out of decently thick steel for the most part which gives me hope it will last a decent period of time. Putting it together was pretty easy, took maybe 30min, they give you an allen key that you can torque without hurting your hand which is nice, they even give you spare screws.The bad, it doesn't use standard parts. The gas cylinder is a class 4 which is good but its only 14" long and an inch of that ends up below the chair, standard size is 15.5" so its not very good for tall people. Also, by the amount it sank when I sat in it, I doubt it will have decent longevity before it starts sinking and needs to be replaced. I have to have it on the highest height in order to be at a normal desk height. Also, the wheels are also not a standard one, they're tiny which is fine for looks but if you roll over even the smallest bump in the floor it gets stuck, also something you'll probably have to replace in the future. The bottom piece is not one piece, it’s how IKEA does it where the legs are screwed into the centre which reduces its longevity. Lastly, the lumbar support only moves 2 inches and is quite small so it doesn't really end up in my lower back.All in all, like I said in the title, if you can get it on sale which I did for 163 CAD including the 30 dollar shipping, its a good deal if you compare it to the other chairs for those of use descended from giants, which are closer to 250 or 300 but don't expect a chair that doesn't creak or wobble a bit cuz it does and made vary clear by the numerous large stickers all over it, its very much made in china.
## 64                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Firstly, the chair does what it says. I've loved it and it's served me well. I'm 6'0 and pushing 400 so it definitely held up its end...for a year.  Within 9 months the back plastic piece along the middle broke and wouldn't stay on.  It's no doubt associated with the weight being pushed onto the ergonomic piece and back into the plastic.  I wasn't upset at that, it's simply an aesthetic piece which served no real purpose.The part I'm mad about though is the seat plate. Around 6 months in the lever to keep it from leaning started to slip and I'd jolt backwards, not the end of the world, I just stopped leaning back as much and checked the lever more frequently.  However, after a slip I noticed the chair had a slight lean to the left where the lever sticks into. I examined it and noticed that some parts had broke and small metal bits were cracked. it's progressively gotten worse and now after a year, I cannot use the chair as it's lean is constant and unsustainable for my back.I wish products advertised as size friendly would also have the same durability as those meant for smaller folk.

## 66                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        I got this chair about 6 months ago when I got a job working full time from home - so I have spent 8-9 hours a day in this chair for the last 6 months. I am 5 foot 5 and weigh over 350 pounds. I am also very hippy - I carry that weight in my butt and thighs. This chair is wide enough to accommodate  my massive backside.When I was putting it together a small piece of plastic that was part of the back broke, so the back did not come together as tightly as it should. Picture 2 shows the gap - but I could not tell that it caused any functional issues so I let it be.With my weight and the casters that were provided, I was hurting my knees getting the chair to move - so I replaced the casters that came with the chair with the rollerblade type casters - that solved that problem. I also added arm cushions to the arm rests. I like the adjustability of the arm rests - they seem to stay put wherever you put them so you can get the height to meet your needs.I have had no problem keeping the chair at the right height - although I now have it at the lowest position because this is most comfortable for my legs.The lumbar support pillow behind the back slides up and down, but does not stay where I put it and ends up down at the bottom by the end of the day. Since I do have a big backside I need the lumbar to be higher.My big issue is that I seem to have worn down any support that existed in the seat cushion. By the end of the day my butt just hurts. I have tried adding a cushion, but that makes the chair too tall for me to easily get in to it. (One of the unspoken issues with being large and trying to sit in a chair with wheels is that you can easily shoot the chair across the room and end up on the floor if you can't sit down into it with enough of your behind in the chair.)I think this chair would be perfectly fine if I was only using it a few hours a day. In fact, I'm good in it for about 4-5 hours a day. It just does not work for me for all day and I have ordered a more expensive chair.

## 82                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Bought this for my home office. It's easy to assemble. The wheels work well on my carpet. It's sturdy enough, overall. It's big! It's probably larger than what I needed, or realized when I bought it. But it works! I have lower back disc issues and a bruised tail bone. I use a special butt-pillow while sitting on this (and any) chair. So far I haven't had any pain arise while using this chair. The back rest is mesh and very firm. I guess that's good considering the weight it's supposed to support. The lumbar piece is really firm, too, which I dislike, but then again, my back hasn't had any problems with it as it does with other office chairs, so maybe this firmness is what my back needs. The seat cushion of the chair is cushy and I could see it being uncomfortable and flattened after prolonged use, so I'd recommend buying an additional cushion if you're like me and have back/butt issues. The arms are adjustable up/down. Since the seat is extra wide, the arms aren't squishing into my sides. The back doesn't recline independently from the chair (a feature my in-office chair has) but rather the whole seat tilts back slightly (not very far). Overall, good chair.
## 83                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           The good, I'm a tall big dude, 6'5" 280lbs so its hard to find chairs that are comfortable and at least right now this is comfortable. It also seems to be made out of decently thick steel for the most part which gives me hope it will last a decent period of time. Putting it together was pretty easy, took maybe 30min, they give you an allen key that you can torque without hurting your hand which is nice, they even give you spare screws.The bad, it doesn't use standard parts. The gas cylinder is a class 4 which is good but its only 14" long and an inch of that ends up below the chair, standard size is 15.5" so its not very good for tall people. Also, by the amount it sank when I sat in it, I doubt it will have decent longevity before it starts sinking and needs to be replaced. I have to have it on the highest height in order to be at a normal desk height. Also, the wheels are also not a standard one, they're tiny which is fine for looks but if you roll over even the smallest bump in the floor it gets stuck, also something you'll probably have to replace in the future. The bottom piece is not one piece, it’s how IKEA does it where the legs are screwed into the centre which reduces its longevity. Lastly, the lumbar support only moves 2 inches and is quite small so it doesn't really end up in my lower back.All in all, like I said in the title, if you can get it on sale which I did for 163 CAD including the 30 dollar shipping, its a good deal if you compare it to the other chairs for those of use descended from giants, which are closer to 250 or 300 but don't expect a chair that doesn't creak or wobble a bit cuz it does and made vary clear by the numerous large stickers all over it, its very much made in china.
## 84                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Firstly, the chair does what it says. I've loved it and it's served me well. I'm 6'0 and pushing 400 so it definitely held up its end...for a year.  Within 9 months the back plastic piece along the middle broke and wouldn't stay on.  It's no doubt associated with the weight being pushed onto the ergonomic piece and back into the plastic.  I wasn't upset at that, it's simply an aesthetic piece which served no real purpose.The part I'm mad about though is the seat plate. Around 6 months in the lever to keep it from leaning started to slip and I'd jolt backwards, not the end of the world, I just stopped leaning back as much and checked the lever more frequently.  However, after a slip I noticed the chair had a slight lean to the left where the lever sticks into. I examined it and noticed that some parts had broke and small metal bits were cracked. it's progressively gotten worse and now after a year, I cannot use the chair as it's lean is constant and unsustainable for my back.I wish products advertised as size friendly would also have the same durability as those meant for smaller folk.

## 86                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        I got this chair about 6 months ago when I got a job working full time from home - so I have spent 8-9 hours a day in this chair for the last 6 months. I am 5 foot 5 and weigh over 350 pounds. I am also very hippy - I carry that weight in my butt and thighs. This chair is wide enough to accommodate  my massive backside.When I was putting it together a small piece of plastic that was part of the back broke, so the back did not come together as tightly as it should. Picture 2 shows the gap - but I could not tell that it caused any functional issues so I let it be.With my weight and the casters that were provided, I was hurting my knees getting the chair to move - so I replaced the casters that came with the chair with the rollerblade type casters - that solved that problem. I also added arm cushions to the arm rests. I like the adjustability of the arm rests - they seem to stay put wherever you put them so you can get the height to meet your needs.I have had no problem keeping the chair at the right height - although I now have it at the lowest position because this is most comfortable for my legs.The lumbar support pillow behind the back slides up and down, but does not stay where I put it and ends up down at the bottom by the end of the day. Since I do have a big backside I need the lumbar to be higher.My big issue is that I seem to have worn down any support that existed in the seat cushion. By the end of the day my butt just hurts. I have tried adding a cushion, but that makes the chair too tall for me to easily get in to it. (One of the unspoken issues with being large and trying to sit in a chair with wheels is that you can easily shoot the chair across the room and end up on the floor if you can't sit down into it with enough of your behind in the chair.)I think this chair would be perfectly fine if I was only using it a few hours a day. In fact, I'm good in it for about 4-5 hours a day. It just does not work for me for all day and I have ordered a more expensive chair.

机としての利用価値は勿論の事、仕舞いやすさ。持ち出しやすさがオススメかと。普段は別のもっと高さのある机を利用していますが、あぐらをかいて座って作業をしたい場合に利用します。その際に、別の部屋から、持ち出しますw　軽いので男性なら持ち運びは簡単かと。いずれにせよ、同じ姿勢で作業していると疲れるので、よく利用させて頂いております♪
